name: V-OMEGA Module 4: VSMR Video Production & Distribution (Complete 65+ Nodes)

parameters.jsonBody:
{
  "model": "gen-4",
  "prompt": "Crystal-Löwe roaring with glass particles exploding in slow motion, volumetric lighting, ray tracing, mobile optimized 9:16 aspect ratio, ASMR visual triggers",
  "image": "{{ $json.crystal_lion_image }}",
  "duration": 10,
  "resolution": "1080p",
  "enhance_prompt": true,
  "camera_control": "precise",
  "reality_distortion": "maximum",
  "aspect_ratio": "9:16"
}

{
  "chat_id": "{{ $vars.telegramChatId }}",
  "text": "🎉 VIRAL CONTENT GENERATED!

🦁 Crystal-Löwe Transformation Complete
🎯 Viral Score: {{ $json.viral_score }}/100
📱 Platforms: TikTok, Instagram, YouTube
🎵 VSMR: {{ $json.vsmr_frequency }}Hz Binaural
✨ Glass Effects: ACTIVATED
🚀 Distribution: LIVE

{{ $json.viral_score >= 8.5 ? '🔥 MEGA-VIRAL POTENTIAL!' : $json.viral_score >= 7.5 ? '⚡ VIRAL READY!' : '📈 OPTIMIZATION NEEDED' }}

Link: {{ $json.final_video_url }}",
  "parse_mode": "HTML"
}
